name.locText: El Retorno De Los Seis Siniestros

bio.text: Once a highly respected physicist and inventor. Dr. Otto Octavius's life took a tragic turn when a lab accident fused his greatest creation, a harness equipped with four mechanical tentacle-like arms, to his body. The same incident left him mentally unstable, amplifying his already existing arrogance to megalomaniacal levels. Seeking to prove himself the greatest criminal mind ever to walk the planet. Octavius embraced the nickname that he had once been given, setting forth to dominate the city as the infamous Doctor Octopus.
bio.locText: Una vez fue un físico e inventor muy respetado. La vida del Dr. Otto Octavius dio un giro trágico cuando un accidente de laboratorio fusionó su mayor creación, un arnés equipado con cuatro brazos mecánicos en forma de tentáculo, a su cuerpo. El mismo incidente lo dejó mentalmente inestable, amplificando su arrogancia ya existente a niveles megalómanos. Buscando probarse a sí mismo como la mente criminal más grande que jamás haya caminado por el planeta. Octavius adoptó el apodo que una vez le habían dado y se dispuso a dominar la ciudad como el infame Doctor Octopus.

description.text: Deal 1 damage to each Hero in any Locations with any Crisis tokens. Then, place 1 Crisis token in Doctor Octopus' Location.
Deal 1 damage to each Hero in any Locations with any Crisis tokens. Then, place 1 Crisis token in Doctor Octopus' Location.
Move all Heroes 1 Location closer to Doctor Octopus. Then BAM!
Move all Heroes 1 Location closer to Doctor Octopus. Then BAM!
Deal 1 damage to 1 Hero in this Location. Then, move this card to the first clockwise Location without a Threat (if possible).
Deal 1 damage to 1 Hero in this Location. Add CIVILIAN and THUG to this Location.
Sandman gains 1 Health. Deal 1 damage to each Hero in this Location.
Each CIVILIAN in this Location requires 1 extra Heroic to be rescued.
Each CIVILIAN in this Location requires 1 extra Heroic to be rescued.
Each CIVILIAN in this Location requires 1 extra Heroic to be rescued.

specialRules.text: When a Location has 3 Crisis tokens, it is destroyed. Remove it from play (if Doctor Octopus is there, he moves clockwise. Any Heroes there move to an adjacent Location of their choice). Locations adjacent to a destroyed one are considered adjacent to each other.

overflow.text: If 1 or more CIVILIAN/THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, add 1 Crisis token to that Location.

bam.text: Deal 1 damage to each Hero in Doctor Octopus' Location and place 1 Crisis token there.

plot.text: The Heroes lose if 4 or more Locations are destroyed.

bio.text: While working on an overhead power line, disgruntled linesman Max Dillon was struck by lightning from a rolling thunderstorm. The resulting electrical shock imbued Dillon with the power to store and discharge vast amounts of electricity. Trading his blue-collar existence for a colorful costume, Dillon has jolted the world of crime for years as the high-voltage villain Electro!
bio.locText: Mientras trabajaba en una línea eléctrica aérea, el ingeniero eléctrico descontento Max Dillon fue alcanzado por un rayo de una tormenta eléctrica. La descarga eléctrica resultante imbuyó a Dillon con el poder de almacenar y descargar grandes cantidades de electricidad. ¡Cambiando su existencia de cuello azul por un traje colorido, Dillon ha sacudido el mundo del crimen durante años como el villano de alto voltaje Electro!

description.text: Place 1 Crisis token on Electro's Location.
Place 1 Crisis token on Electro's Location.
Electro can't take any damage until each Hero has played a card in the Storyline after this Master Plan card.
Electro can't take any damage until each Hero has played a card in the Storyline after this Master Plan card.
When a Hero takes damage in this Location, they take 1 extra damage.
When a Hero takes damage in this Location, they take 1 extra damage.
LOCATION. Electro gains 3 Health (may go above his starting value)
LOCATION. Electro gains 3 Health (may go above his starting value)
LOCATION. Play another Master Plan card after resolving the current one.
LOCATION. Play another Master Plan card after resolving the current one.

specialRules.text: If a Crisis token should be placed on a Location that already has one, place the Crisis token on the next clockwise Location instead. As long as a Location has a Crisis token on it, Heroes cannot use its End of Turn effect. When a Hero is KO'd, Electro doesn't activate his BAM! Instead, he places 1 Crisis token on that Hero's Location.

overflow.text: If 1 or more CIVILIAN/THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, add 1 Crisis token to that Location.

bam.text: Deal 1 damage to each Hero in the Location opposite to Electro's, and in both Locations adjacent to that.

plot.text: The Heroes lose if all Locations in play have a Crisis token.

bio.text: Former Russian noble Sergei Kravinoff came to America for one reason: to hunt Spider-Man, the ultimate prey. Kraven’s fighting skills combined with mystical strength-enhancing potions from the darkest jungles of Africa made him a prolific gamesman, a legacy that has outlived him. Kraven the Hunter’s initial pursuit of the wall-crawler gave way to a years-long feud, and Kraven's repeated failures slowly drove him to the brink of insanity, and eventually resulted in his death.
bio.locText: El ex noble ruso Sergei Kravinoff llegó a Estados Unidos por una razón: para cazar a Spider-Man, la presa definitiva. Las habilidades de lucha de Kraven, combinadas con pociones místicas para mejorar la fuerza de las selvas más oscuras de África, lo convirtieron en un jugador prolífico, un legado que lo ha sobrevivido. La persecución inicial de Kraven el Cazador del trepamuros dio paso a una disputa de años, y los repetidos fracasos de Kraven lo llevaron lentamente al borde de la locura, y finalmente resultaron en su muerte.

description.text: 1 Hero in Kraven's Location takes I Crisis token. Then BAM!
1 Hero in Kraven's Location takes I Crisis token. Then BAM!
1 Hero in Kraven's Location takes I Crisis token. Then BAM!
1 Hero in Kraven's Location takes I Crisis token. Then BAM!
If there are no CIVILIAN or THUG in this Location, when a Hero takes a damage here, they take 1 extra damage.
If there are no CIVILIAN or THUG in this Location, when a Hero takes a damage here, they take 1 extra damage.
If there are no CIVILIAN or THUG in this Location, when a Hero takes a damage here, they take 1 extra damage.
Every time Kraven takes damage in this Location, he ignores the first damage received.
Every time Kraven takes damage in this Location, he ignores the first damage received.
Every time Kraven takes damage in this Location, he ignores the first damage received.

specialRules.text: When a Haroe is KO’d, Kraven doesn't activate his BAM! Instead, he plays another Master Plan card.

overflow.text: If 1 or more CIVILIAN/THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, I Hero must take 1 damage (Heroes choose).

bam.text: Deal 1 damage to each Hero in Kraven's Location. Plus, any 1 Hero with Crisis tokens takes 1 damage per Crisis token they have.

plot.text: The Heries lose if they are all KO'd at the same time.

bio.text: Hollywood stuntman and special effects wizard Quentin Beck found his current career as a dead-end job. With dreams of grandeur, he decided to put his expertise in illusions to use as the super-villain Mysterio! In his holographic inducing costume, he has utilized many clever traps that have constantly been exposed by the Amazing Spider-Man!
bio.locText: El especialista de Hollywood y mago de efectos especiales Quentin Beck encontró su carrera actual como un trabajo sin futuro. ¡Con sueños de grandeza, decidió poner su experiencia en ilusiones para usar como el súper villano Mysterio! ¡Con su traje de inducir holográfico, ha utilizado muchas trampas inteligentes que han sido expuestas constantemente por el Amazing Spider-Man!

description.text: Shuffle all Threat cards in play (discarding any tokens on them). Then, put them back facedown starting on Mysterio's Location and going clockwise.
Shuffle all Threat cards in play (discarding any tokens on them). Then, put them back facedown starting on Mysterio's Location and going clockwise.
Discard all CIVILIAN and THUG in Mysterio's Location. Then, draw another Master Plan card and add it facedown in the Storyline.
Discard all CIVILIAN and THUG in Mysterio's Location. Then, draw another Master Plan card and add it facedown in the Storyline.
When this Threat is revealed, the Hero revealing it takes 1 damage.
When this Threat is revealed, the Hero revealing it takes 1 damage.
When this Threat is revealed, add THUG to this Location.
When this Threat is revealed, add CIVILIAN to this Location.
Mysterio can now be damaged (once 2 Missions have been completed).
Mysterio can now be damaged (once 2 Missions have been completed).

specialSetup.text: Shuffle the Threat cards and place them facedown on the Locations.

specialRules.text: As long as there are no broken Illusion Threat cards faceup, Mysterio can't take any damage (2 Missions must still be completed before he can be damaged).  To turn a Threat card faceup, any Hero in its Location must spend a single action (of any type).

overflow.text: If 1 or more CIVILIAN/THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, draw another Master Plan card and add it facedown in the Storyline.

bam.text: Turn all CIVILIAN tokens in play into THUG and vice versa. Then, add CIVILIAN to Mysterio's Location.

bio.text: From an early age, Willam Baker chose to live a life of crime, often finding himself behind bars. Baker escaped one of his incarcerations only to find himself on a beach near an atomic testing site. After being bombarded with a massive dose of radiation, Baker awoke with the ability to transform himself into sand-like forms that he could manipulate and reshape at will. Eager to put his new abilities to use, he attempted a series of audacious robberies as the Sandman!
bio.locText: Desde una edad temprana, Willam Baker eligió vivir una vida delictiva, encontrándose a menudo tras las rejas. Baker escapó de uno de sus encarcelamientos solo para encontrarse en una playa cerca de un sitio de pruebas atómicas. Después de ser bombardeado con una dosis masiva de radiación, Baker se despertó con la capacidad de transformarse en formas parecidas a la arena que podía manipular y remodelar a voluntad. Ansioso por poner en práctica sus nuevas habilidades, intentó una serie de audaces robos como ¡el Hombre de Arena!

description.text: From now on, Sandman cannot take any damage until all Sandstorm Threat cards are cleared.
1 Hero in Sandman's Location takes 1 damage for each Hero there.
Deal 1 damage to each Hero in both adjacent Locations.
Discard any Action tokens from the Threat card in Sandman's Location. Then, each Hero there takes 1 damage for each token discarded.
Heroes using MOVE to leave this Location must use MOVE MOVE instead.
Heroes using MOVE to leave this Location must use MOVE MOVE instead.
If the Harder Master Plan card is in the Storyline, Sandman cannot take damage.
If the Harder Master Plan card is in the Storyline, Sandman cannot take damage.
Deal 1 damage to each Hero in this Location. If there are no Heroes in this Location, deal 1 damage to each Hero in adjacent Locations.
Deal 1 damage to 1 Hero in this Location.

specialRules.text: When a Hero is KO'd, Sandman doesn't activate his BAM! Instead, he plays another Master Plan card.

overflow.text: If 1 or more CIVILIAN/THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, Sandman gains 2 Health.

bam.text: Sandman gains 2 Health. Deal 1 damage to each Hero in Sandman's Location.

plot.text: The Heroes lose if Sandman reaches 20 Health (may ga above his starting value).

bio.text: Racked by physical infirmities and a driving desire to reclaim his youth, the elderly electronics engineer Adrian Toomes fashioned a magnetic wing harness that augments his strength and allows him to take in the air at dizzying speeds. Throughout his high-flying criminal career, Toomes has proven a calculating, remorseless killer who is always willing to team up with fellow villains if he thinks it will finally provide the means to defeat his arch-foe Spider-Man.
bio.locText: Atormentado por debilidades físicas y un deseo imperioso de recuperar su juventud, el anciano ingeniero electrónico Adrian Toomes fabricó un arnés de ala magnética que aumenta su fuerza y le permite tomar el aire a velocidades vertiginosas. A lo largo de su carrera criminal de alto vuelo, Toomes ha demostrado ser un asesino calculador e implacable que siempre está dispuesto a formar equipo con otros villanos si cree que finalmente le proporcionará los medios para derrotar a su archienemigo Spider-Man.

description.text: If this is not the first Heist Plan card in the Storyline, steal 1 Crisis token from each Location without Heroes.
If this is not the first Heist Plan card in the Storyline, steal 1 Crisis token from each Location without Heroes.
If this is not the first Heist Plan card in the Storyline, steal 1 Crisis token from each Location without Heroes.
If this is not the first Heist Plan card in the Storyline, steal 1 Crisis token from each Location without Heroes.
If Vulture is attacked here, he only takes 1 damage and immediately moves to the opposite Locatian.
If Vulture is attacked here, he only takes 1 damage and immediately moves to the opposite Locatian.
LOCATION. Each Hero in this Location takes 2 damage.
LOCATION. Each Hero in this Location takes 2 damage.
BAM! Deal 2 damage to 1 Hero in this Location.
BAM! Deal 1 damage to each Hero in this Locatian. If there are no Heroes in this Locatian, steal 1 Crisis token here

specialSetup.text: Place 3 Crisis tokens (Spoils) on each Location.

superVillainText.text: Regardless of the number of Heroes, they lose if Vulture obtains 12 Spoils.
superVillainText.locText: Independientemente del número de Héroes, los Héroes pierden si Vulture obtiene 12 fichas de Botín.

overflow.text: If 1 or more CIVILIAN/THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, steal 1 Crisis token (Spoils) from that Location.

bam.text: Steal 1 Crisis token (Spoils) from Vulture's Location (if available). Then, move all Heroes to the Location opposite to Vulture. Any Heroe in Vulture's Location can prevent this effect by taking 2 damage.

plot.text: The Heroes lose if Vulture has obtained enough Crisis tokens (Spoils): 2 Players: 9 tokens, 3 Players: 7 tokens, 4 Players: 5 tokens.

bio.text:
Perhaps it required someone with an intellect as towering as Doctor Otto Octavius to conclude that heroes are much stronger and more effective working as a group, and villains should therefore adopt the same tactics. Naturally, villains are mistrustful of each other, and therein lies the problem. But with someone like Doc Ock in charge, and by executing successful plan after plan, even the most misanthropic villain can see the advantages of teamwork.
Enter: The Sinister Six! Doctor Octopus has called together the most dangerous villains of New York City, united by their hatred of Spider-Man. Between Electro's raw power, Sandman's incredible strength, Vulture's tech savvy, Kraven's savage cunning, and Mysterio's mind-bending illusions, Doctor Octopus has the makings of an Avengers-level threat! With the Six working together, even Earth's mightiest heroes will fall before their collective villainy!
Bringing the Six to justice will require coordination, planning, quick thinking, and teamwork the likes of which the evil Six can only dream of. Let us show the Sinister Six that even villains working in concert are no match for heroes that stand united!
bio.locText:
Quizás se requirió a alguien con un intelecto tan elevado como el doctor Otto Octavius para concluir que los héroes son mucho más fuertes y más efectivos trabajando en grupo, y por lo tanto, los villanos deberían adoptar las mismas tácticas. Naturalmente, los villanos desconfían unos de otros, y ahí radica el problema. Pero con alguien como Doc Ock a cargo, y al ejecutar con éxito un plan tras otro, incluso el villano más misántropo puede ver las ventajas del trabajo en equipo.
Aparecen ¡Los Seis Siniestros! El Doctor Octopus ha reunido a los villanos más peligrosos de la ciudad de Nueva York, unidos por su odio a Spider-Man. Entre la potencia bruta de Electro, la increíble fuerza de El hombre de arena, la habilidad tecnológica de Buitre, la astucia salvaje de Kraven y las alucinantes ilusiones de Misterio, el Doctor Octopus tiene los ingredientes de una amenaza de nivel Vengadores. ¡Con los Seis trabajando juntos, incluso los héroes más poderosos de la Tierra caerán ante su villanía colectiva!
Llevar a los Seis ante la justicia requerirá coordinación, planificación, pensamiento rápido y trabajo en equipo con los que los malvados Seis solo pueden soñar. ¡Demostremos a los Sinister Six que incluso los villanos que trabajan juntos no son rival para los héroes que están unidos!

title.locText: EL RETORNO DE LOS SEIS SINIESTROS

description.text: Actívate ALL undefeated Villains (start with Doctor Octopus and go clockwise on the dashboard).
Doctor Octopus
Electro
Kraven
Mysterio
Sandman
Vulture

specialRules.text: When a Hero is KO'd, no BAM! effect is activated. Instead, add 1 Master Plan card facedown in the Storyline. Mysterio: Heroes with any Crisis tokens must play their Hero card randomly on their turn. Then, they discard 1 Crisis token. Vulture: When he would take damage, if he has any CIVILIAN/THUG tokens, ignore any damage he would take this turn and move those tokens to this Location.

overflow.text: If 1 or more CIVILIAN/THUG tokens can't be added to a Location, draw another Master Plan card can add it facedown in the Storyline.

bam.text: Doctor Octopus: Place 1 Crisis token in Doctor Octopus' Location. Then, deal 1 damage to each Hero in all Locations with any Crisis tokens. Vulture: If there are any CIVILIAN/THUG tokens in Vulture's Location, move all of them to this Dashboard. Electro: Deal 1 damage to each Hero in both Locations adjacent to Electro. Sandman: Sandman gains 1 Health (may go above his starting value). Deal 1 damage to each Hero in his Location. Kraven: Deal 2 damage to the first lone Hero, going clockwise from Kraven's Location. If there are no lone Heroes, add CIVILIAN CIVILIAN to Kraven's Location instead. Mysterio: Give 1 Crisis token to each Hero in Mysterio's Location.
